creator: carsten.siedentop@guug.de
text:
Created attachment 22609
patch 

The environment variable FOP_OPTS is not used by the batch files
fop.bat and fop.cmd

In compliance to fop.sh I changed fop.bat AND fop.cmd. 
Both fixes were successfully tested with the current source 
version based on SVN from date 20080918 and also tested with the 
current stable version 0.95.

You can reproduce the bug with any huge .xsl-fo file or .fo file starting FOP under Windows with fop.bat.


The patch is attached.

Carsten Siedentop

Patch applied to FOP Trunk. See: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=697152&view=rev

Thanks for the contribution!
creator: adelmelle@apache.org
gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
